name: Amalien Haus

reviews.text: The Amalien Haus is recently refurbished so all the rooms and public areas are in very good condition. My daughter and I had a good ski break here during half-term. Indeed, during the ski season you will only get skiiers here.
reviews.title: Excellent ski resort

likes.disliked: — noise from the street at night

description: Perfectly positioned in the centre of St Anton, the Amalien Haus chalet is less than a five minute walk from the main ski lifts and resort amenities. Located over three floors, the chalet sleeps up to 31 guests in 15 bedrooms. The rooms are spacious and contemporary, with either open-plan en-suite bathrooms or private en-suite bathrooms. The Amalien Haus is available for flexible durations, including long weekends, mid-week breaks and week-long holidays.
